issue.title: [JS] Implement Schema/Field/DataType comparators
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4553](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4553). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some basic type comparison logic is necessary for `Table#assign()`. PR incoming.
